title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The system allows instantiation of the BidiUtil class.
EB: Add a private constructor to the BidiUtil class to prevent instantiation. This is necessary because there are no nonstatic methods in this class. Additionally, making the constructor private does not increase the size of the class.
SR: To resolve this issue, change the line above to: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), 'windowProc', 4). Though it has not been tested, it is expected to perform the same function.
